notes.title: MEME /miÀêm/
notes.definition: an image, video, or text that is humorous and copied/shared rapidly by internet users
examples: That cat meme made me laugh so hard!
Did you see the latest meme about coffee?

notes.title: TAKE A CHILL PILL!
notes.definition: (slang) relax! calm down! don't stress or overreact
examples: You're too nervous, take a chill pill!
It's just a game, take a chill pill.

notes.title: TO RUIN TEAM MORALE
notes.definition: to destroy the positive feelings or motivation in a group
examples: Constant criticism can ruin team morale.
The manager's anger ruined everyone's morale.

notes.title: TO LIP-READ
notes.definition: to understand what someone says by watching their lips
examples: She can lip-read because she's hard of hearing.
I tried to lip-read what the actor said on stage.

exercises.question: Complete: You need to ___ before making important decisions.
What does 'to ruin team morale' mean?
options: To destroy positive motivation in a group

exercises.question: Practice Exercise
exercises.instructions: Write three sentences using the vocabulary from today's session. Share them in the comments section!
